entry: Classes: [class basilica2.agents.listeners.PresenceWatcher, class basilica2.agents.listeners.MessageAnnotator, class basilica2.social.listeners.ActivityTracker, class basilica2.tutor.listeners.TutorialTriggerWatcher, class basilica2.tutor.listeners.TutorTurnWatcher, class basilica2.social.listeners.StrategyScoreComputer, class basilica2.social.listeners.RuleBasedTriggerComputer, class basilica2.social.listeners.SocialController, class basilica2.accountable.listeners.AgreeDisagreeActor, class basilica2.accountable.listeners.AskForExplanationActor, class basilica2.accountable.listeners.RevoiceActor, class basilica2.accountable.listeners.SayMoreActor]

Classes: [class basilica2.social.listeners.SocialController, class basilica2.accountable.listeners.AgreeDisagreeActor, class basilica2.accountable.listeners.AskForExplanationActor, class basilica2.accountable.listeners.RevoiceActor, class basilica2.accountable.listeners.SayMoreActor, class basilica2.agents.listeners.plan.PlanExecutor, class basilica2.tutor.listeners.TutorActor]
Conditions set to participation social tutorial_trigger
Conditions set to participation social tutorial_trigger revoice
Conditions set to participation social tutorial_trigger revoice explain
Conditions set to participation social tutorial_trigger revoice explain agree
Conditions set to participation social tutorial_trigger say_more revoice explain agree
default priority=0.75, wait 0.1 seconds after prompts, +3.3333333333333335 wps
notified UI of agent launch for VirtualCarolyn_FancyBazaar-3
ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: Hello! I'm VirtualCarolyn. Take a minute to introduce yourselves. INTRODUCE
starting 10 second delay timer for GREETINGS
accepted. Message from VirtualCarolyn: While I won't answer your questions directly, I can help guide your group discussion. SETUP. Starting blockout countdown...
starting 10 second delay timer for SETUP_STEP
PLAN: no idea what to do with timeout key GREETINGS
accepted. Message from VirtualCarolyn: Once you get an idea of what's going on, replace these prompts with something domain appropriate! INSTRUCTIONS. Starting blockout countdown...
starting 10 second delay timer for INSTRUCTIONS_STEP
accepted. Message from VirtualCarolyn: You can also share images to the whiteboard: WHITEBOARD_INSTRUCTIONS. Starting blockout countdown...
starting 5 second delay timer for WHITEBOARD_INSTRUCTIONS
ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: Okay! Let's begin. GIVE_UP_ON_INTRODUCTIONS
starting 5 second delay timer for SHOW_IMAGE
accepted. Message from VirtualCarolyn: ... okay SHOW_COMPREHENSION_APPROVAL+SOCIAL. Starting blockout countdown...

accepted. Message from VirtualCarolyn: The agent is listening for several kinds of triggers to start supporting students. |For example, David cares a lot about "Accountable Talk" style facilitation these days. | The provided AT example is configured for college chemistry. If you've turned on any of the revoice, agree, say_more, or explain conditions, try saying something like "boiling point increases with dipole moment."|(and then wait a little while, this behavior waits for other students to follow up before offering support.) ABOUT_ACCOUNTABLE_TALK. Starting blockout countdown...
starting 45 second delay timer for ABOUT_AT_STEP

accepted. Message from VirtualCarolyn: Now I'll start an interactive dialogue.|Even if you disable tutorial triggers, you can still have dialogues in your macro-script. ABOUT_TUTORIALS. Starting blockout countdown...

accepted. Message from VirtualCarolyn: Note that other agent behaviors (like accountable-talk style listening) will be suppressed while the dialogue is underway. ABOUT_LISTENING. Starting blockout countdown...
ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: We can work on your basic zoology. Are you ready? TUTOR
ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: Let's get started. TUTOR
ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: There are three kinds of animals - birds, fish, and mammals.|Can you tell me something about some kind of animal? TUTOR
ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: ...that's a mammal!|Let's try something harder - what kind of animal gives birth to live young? TUTOR
ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: ...?|Let's try something harder - what kind of animal gives birth to live young? TUTOR
ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: Fish and birds lay eggs. Mammals give birth to live young, and give their babies milk!|You're ready to be a zoologist! TUTOR
starting 10 second delay timer for DEMO_TUTORIAL
ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: It sounds like you're confused. Would you like some help? TUTOR
rejected! Message from VirtualCarolyn: Got it SHOW_COMPREHENSION_APPROVAL+SOCIAL
rejected! Message from VirtualCarolyn: Do you have any thoughts, gst? ENCOURAGE_INDIVIDUAL+SOCIAL
